item.title: University of Southern California grad student charged with drugging and raping
item.description: A University of Southern California graduate student who police say is a serial sexual predator has been charged with drugging and raping multiple wom...

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 10-13-28-34-47, Powerball: 15

item.title: Senate Democrats, holding out for health care, ready to reject government funding bill for 10th time
item.description: Senate Democrats are poised for the 10th time to reject a stopgap spending bill that would reopen the government

item.title: Storm decimates 2 Alaskan villages and drives more than 1,500 people from their homes
item.description: Officials say one of the “most significant” airlifts in Alaska history is underway to evacuate hundreds of people from storm-devastated coastal towns

item.title: Authorities identify remains of 14 of 16 victims in Tennessee explosion
item.description: Authorities say they have identified the remains of 14 of the 16 people killed last week in a massive blast at a Tennessee explosives plant
